subject: Basketball
United States International Relations
Diplomatic Service, Embassies and Consulates
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. star Kareem Abdul-Jabbar was named a United States cultural ambassador Wednesday, a job that will begin with a trip to Brazil.
snippet: The former N.B.A. star Kareem Abdul-Jabbar was named a United States cultural ambassador Wednesday, a job that will begin with a trip to Brazil.
